content.p: Marketing Manager (Student Recruitment), Responsible for managing student recruitment marketing initiatives in partnership with academics and professional service departments. Uses market research and analysis to direct marketing strategy and planning. Administers the production of all student recruitment promotional materials and marketing campaigns. Also oversees the corporate brand, web, social media, digital advertisements, corporate gifts management and enquiry management functionalities within Corporate Marketing. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
